description:
This package contains the official SDK tools authored by the Microsoft Dynamics CRM SDK team.

The included command line tools are installed in the project's bin\coretools folder.
releaseNotes:
This package contains SDK tools for the Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online 2015 Update 1 release. These tools may be used for application and solution development. The Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.2 must be installed on the computer where these tools are to execute.

        This version of the package fixes the layout of folders to make the package more usable.

7.1.0: Final CRM Online 2015 Update 1 SDK tools
7.1.0-preview: Preview CRM Online 2015 Update 1 SDK tools
7.0.1: CRM 2015 UR1 SDK tools
7.0.0.3: Added the Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CodeGeneration.dll assembly for use with developer extensions.
7.0.0.2: Added the WebsiteCopy.exe tool for portal development
7.0.0.1: Final (RTM) CRM 2015 SDK tools
7.0.0:  Preview CRM 2015 SDK tools
summary: Tools required to develop managed code applications and solutions for Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online 2015 Update 1. Layout has been fixed from the official Microsoft version, otherwise it's exactly the same
title: Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2015 SDK core tools
